meanings.definition: A person or thing that glues.
meanings.sent1: The gluers in the factory work hard to stick things together.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy some gluers to fix my broken vase.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gluers decided to glue all the chairs to the ceiling as a prank.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like gluers, binding us together in friendship.
meanings.sent5: The gluers in his hands were his tools of creation, bringing his art to life.

meanings.sent1: The gluers in the workshop were running low on adhesive.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a pack of gluers online for her crafting project.
meanings.sent3: The gluers gathered around the table, ready to start their gluing competition.
meanings.sent4: The gluers on the assembly line worked tirelessly to keep up with demand.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the scent of glue as the gluers busily worked on their tasks.
